summary: Sysbook route migration testing complete. All API routes successfully migrated from /api/store/* to /api/sysbook/*. Old routes correctly return 404. Frontend UI loads correctly with updated API endpoints.
passed_tests: Backend: Admin login with teck@koh.one / Acdb##0897 works (POST /api/auth-v2/login)
Backend: GET /api/sysbook/browse/access returns has_access and students list
Backend: GET /api/sysbook/school-year/config returns school year config
Backend: GET /api/sysbook/access/config returns public form config (no auth needed)
Frontend: Unatienda page loads with products and category navigation
Frontend: 'School Textbooks' button present with lock icon (private catalog)
Frontend: Admin login page loads and accepts credentials
Frontend: Admin dashboard loads with SYSBOOK sidebar section
Frontend: SYSBOOK sidebar shows Inventory, Students & Schools, Pre-Sale Import links
critical_code_review_comments: Route migration verified: All sysbook routes moved from store/ module to sysbook/ module
New router prefix /api/sysbook/* correctly configured in sysbook/routes/__init__.py
Store module (__init__.py) no longer includes sysbook routes (clean separation)
Frontend API URLs updated in Unatienda.jsx (line 144): /api/sysbook/browse/access
Frontend API URLs updated in BooksByStudent.jsx: /api/sysbook/browse/*
Frontend API URLs updated in PrivateBookDetail.jsx: /api/sysbook/browse/*
context_for_next_testing_agent: Route migration from /api/store/* to /api/sysbook/* verified complete. Key endpoints: browse/access, access/my-students, orders/my-orders, presale-import/orders, school-year/config, bulk-import/history. All old /api/store/sysbook-catalog/*, /api/store/textbook-access/*, /api/store/textbook-orders/* routes return 404. Frontend pages (Unatienda.jsx, BooksByStudent.jsx, PrivateBookDetail.jsx) use new /api/sysbook/* URLs. Admin panel shows SYSBOOK section with correct navigation links.
